new wave.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a group of people who try to introduce new ideas in music, films, art, politics etc
new wave.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a new wave of feminism in the sixties and early seventies
new wave.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a type of music that was popular in the 1970s and early 1980s, which uses synthesizers and a strong beat, and in which the words are sung without much emotion
new wave.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a new style of music, art, film etc that is very different and unusual
new wave.translation[1].definitions[0].e: the new wave of Black feminist theorists
